website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy S III is the best smartphone you can get on Boost Mobile, but it'll cost you.
cons: Data speeds are not quite as fast as many other carriers

customer_reviews.title: Love the price and the phone!
customer_reviews.text: This was the cheapest Galaxy SIII I could find with Boost, and I am very happy with it. I was afraid it would be damaged or there would be something wrong with it because of the price and the fact that I ordered it online, but there are absolutely no problems. It was not damaged at all during shipping. I had no trouble activating it and using it. As for the Galaxy SIII in general, I really like it. It is fast, easy to navigate and has a lot of features I enjoy. I am very glad I got this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was pretty quick whish I knew I was going to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was pretty quick whish I knew I was going to have to sign for it when delivered had to go pick it up at the post office at Christmas time Oh Geese. Love the phone it was listed as very good shape. I would say it was more like excellent shape had just a couple of tiny scuffs on the plastic cover screen was perfect. Phone has operated like it was new, battery life on this Samsung Galaxy S III is better than the Samsung Galaxy S III I was using even when it was new. Very pleased with the phone they delivered thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ccrisy Hill

customer_reviews.title: very good phone with very very crappy battery
customer_reviews.text: l really like the phone, looks nice, easy to navigate, i budget and won't cost a fortune with post paid connection. However very disappointed with the battery, it is worse than my 3 years old HTC rhyme, it drains within 5-6 hours from 100% to 0% completely while idle , without making a single phone call, texting or even using data, I am planning to buy a higher strength battery with 7200RPM but I saw reviews that it is bulky and disrupts with IQ signal. Besides I am worried if my cool tardis case cover that i just got for this phone won't fit anymore. With such nice phone they could have provided a better battery. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rima

customer_reviews.title: Phone is great new 5 stars or like new 4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Phone works great for the price. Had an issue ands the seller was quick to resolve the issue. Recommend this. Becareful buying used phones as this one did not last a year and i tried to have it fixed which it had been fixed already so i was burnt as it all happened after 3 months with phone and seller could and would do nothing about it. 3 stars for the one i got as it was still a good phone even though i had to get and external charger as it would no longer charge or send and receive data via plug
customer_reviews.author: Eedy1

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy 3
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Galaxy S3., and I am just as happy with this one as I was with my first. It takes beautiful pictures, battery life is average.depends on how many apps you have open. I am not overjoyed with speakers, but used with bluetooth it is great. The screen size could be bigger...but overall I would buy this phone for the price over any other. I had the LTE Max...where I loved the large phone, I was not happy with the battery life....Samsung phones are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor M. Schroers

customer_reviews.title: WeSellCellular is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: Getting a used (or reconditioned ) Galaxy III from WeSellCellular is the way to go! I saved a ton of money all the way around with super low cosy, free (and fast) shipping and a friendly distributor who backs up your purchase. WeSellCellular delivered a beautiful and brand new looking phone and when I found a operating issue, they replaced it faster (and easier) than if I had bought it new at a local storefront! I'm seriously telling all my friends to order from these guys!
customer_reviews.author: iNO!

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III has been a bust!
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped charging six months after we got it. There is a flaw in the charging port that is now well noted on the internet. So we have a useless yet expensive phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone!! No problems in the first few months I've had it. Still getting used to all the functions as I am not very phone savvy. But I find it pretty easy to figure out. I'm learning new things it does as I go. The reason for the 4 star rating is the battery life sometimes seem a little short and the volume is not as loud as I thought it would be. All in all it's a GREAT phone and I am Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Fornwald

customer_reviews.title: Best phone so far...
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have owned so far. I've had I for over a year now and I have nothing bad to say about it, it's still like I got it yesterday. Signal is great. It's also pretty fast I use it on social media, playing music, school stuff like reading documents and such and mobile games. Camera gives you really great quality photos and videos. Love the screen it's not too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: ERRWUT

customer_reviews.title: I am still learning about this phone !!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome, I can't live without it. There is so much too learn and I find myself doing tricks that I didn't know it could do. If you are a techie, then give this phone a try. What I do to keep a good battery life.....is turn off wifi to reserve it for later until I need it, so my battery will not drain. I can't say nothing wrong about this phone but it is AWESOME!!! Good luck cell phone shopping people!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Diva 76

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Lasted me forever, all beat up, half of the screen missing after 2 years, dropped it so many times and till this day if i charge it it still works!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check the charging port before transferring your info over.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself was in very good condition. However, I had to return it (at my expense) because the charging port did not work properly. I had to wiggle the charging cable to get the phone to charge. I tried the one included with the cell and an original one I had on hand. If the cable was touched, the phone stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen S.

customer_reviews.title: Still works great.
customer_reviews.text: Over a year later and this phone is still going strong. Only downside is battery life has slightly diminished. Can't beat 5GB LTE for $45 especially with excellent coverage in my area.
customer_reviews.author: CantFindItPrimeHasIt

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III(Boost Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for shipping me my phone so fast,a day after xmas :) now this is one of the best boost mobile phones that I've ever owned its very fast on 3G and 4G LTE and for 55 a month with shrinkage you cant go wrong and with the 4.3 jellybean update it flawless its rumor that boost is getting the Note II & the S4 too I'm pleased with the S3 i might get the IPhone 5S this spring
customer_reviews.author: L Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Love This Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone more then any other I have gotten. Only Thing I miss is Boost Mobile mobile hotspot with the S2, but if you have that and are thinking of upgrading you have noticed that has gone to crap anyway! Worth the money! Just do it! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Silver Marenwolf

customer_reviews.title: Really am happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone has very good call quality which is my main focus. I like all of the other features of this phone. I had the Galaxy S a while ago and that sold me on Samsung and Galaxy. Also, very happy with Amazon's price. I am a Boost Mobile subscriber and Amazon's price saved me $150.00 off of Boost's price. No phone should cost $399.99!. Not in my world.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara81

customer_reviews.title: Great Multi-purpose Smart Phone
customer_reviews.text: The device has a nice large screen, yet still fits in my pockets, nicely. I use it as an MP3 player, a Kindle reader, for email. for basic web navigation and, of course, for texting and phoning. While there is more than enough internal storage space for everyday use, I added a large microSD card and use it as my day-to-day camera while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: KarlB47

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS PHONE AS A GIFT FOR MY WIFE,,,BECAUSE SHE LOVES SAMSUNG ,,,ACTUALLY SHE HAD A SAMSUNG PREVAIL 2,BUT WITH THE GALAXY S 3 SHE IS SO HAPPY BECAUSE, NOT ONLY THE LOOKS, IT IS A BEATIFULL PHONE!BUT THE PHONE IS REALLY FAST, COMPARED WITH THE PREVAIL 2,,,,,ANYWAY IT IS A GREAT PHONE...IT IS WORTH EVERY PENNY YOU PAY FOR IT....THANKS A LOT..
customer_reviews.author: augie bec

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: So when I open the box to get the phone I look around and it looks like there was an electrical issue or something caught on fire with the phone. I am very unhappy about this purchase. The phone glitches for some reason. And when I push the home button or the on button the screen don't turn on. Now it is freezing. If I could rate it 0 stars I would. And it's not samsung it's amazon. Wow. Just WOW
customer_reviews.author: Josh sharp

customer_reviews.title: Used Does Not Equate To Defective
customer_reviews.text: Apparently Edge Cellular's definition of a used phone is defective. The phone I bought keeps malfunctioning (The notifications tab pulls down without prompting and the World Clock widget does the same thing) and it interferes with everyday usage such navigating apps. I definitely feel cheated and will not buy from Cellular Edge ever again. A refund would be nice!
customer_reviews.author: ButIStayWoke

customer_reviews.title: Old but works great
customer_reviews.text: this was a old phone, there are newer ones, but I got a great deal, and it did more than I ever needed. I might upgrade one day but for now why, this one still works.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Small Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever bought. Its expensive but well worth it if you use it all the time. Much better than Apple products. After seeing the Moto G, a few less features are worth the $170 in savings. The screen size is a little smaller, it does not have 4G, camera is a little weaker but the battery is a lot better. If I would've looked at the moto G prior to buying the S I don't think I would've bought the S3.
customer_reviews.author: wingsfan

customer_reviews.title: well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new phone, this is such an upgrade from S2. I love that the battery last all day, when it is fully charged it tells you to unplug it. This is a good thing.A device can be over charged. The set up is a Little different but it will not take long to get use to. It is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone already, and I bought this for my girlfriend because she was jealous of my phone :) She loves it! I've had mine for about 2 years now, and I won't be upgrading until it doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but low battery and flimsy charging port
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy S3 is the best of the Boist mobile phones i have owned. The 16g storage space give you room for all the apps you need. I had to send one phone back to Samsung warranty to fix a loose charging port. That seems to be a common issue. Also, the battery life isnt great. I have no complaints with Boost service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! Easy to use. Great camera. The only issue I have with taking pics is that it's hard to do one-handed because of the width of the phone. Not a big deal though. I got a 2nd one for my husband fate r using mine for 6 months. Love being able to s h are pics by touching our 2 phones together!
customer_reviews.author: LLK

customer_reviews.title: I like how big the phone is and thought i would ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is junk and samsung will not do anything about it! I cant even make calls on it as the people i am talking to complain of it echoing i have talked with samsung about this and they wont do anything about it not to mention the battery dies so fast it has to be charged 3 times a day! I like how big the phone is and thought i would really like the phone! Probably would have if it actually worked! Waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful phone
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about getting a more or less used phone, but then it finally came, and it didn't even look like had ever been touched.That was sure a relief.So it passed the first inspection then i was waiting to see how well it worked.Again it passed. so I was gratefully surprised and most thankful that this was not a costly mistake. The only thing I was just a little disappointed about was the shipping I paid $10.00 for 2 days expedited shipping, and it still took 5 days after it was shipped but I don't think it was the seller's fault, it was the USPS who was slow. I would definitely recommend this seller. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Brenda wallace

customer_reviews.title: Handset was extraordinarily dirty and filthy
customer_reviews.text: Handset was extraordinarily dirty and filthy. They could have at least cleaned it before they sold it. Also too many apps running at once which rapidly drained the battery. Had to delete / force stop many apps so the phone would charge and and the battery would not drain as quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NELSON PLUMMER

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good seller phone works great had no issues had it for almost 2 years then I decided to upgrade good seller
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Very fast
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Very fast. And because I bought it in July 2014, very affordable! The caveat is that its battery life is very short. Mine cannot make it 12 hours without charging and heavy use. Nonetheless, I am very happy with my S III.
customer_reviews.author: David M Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the upgrade from S2 because the S3 picks up LTE towers, and now I have 4G, ALL THE TIME. Boost says the S3 is 4G, but the S3 only picks up 4G from WiMax, so in a year, I NEVER ONCE had 4G on my S2. With the KitKat update coming out, it will make the S3 almost an S4, too!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: TerrellR

customer_reviews.title: Ok Phone
customer_reviews.text: I got on time. Works ok. I had this phone before. Just not my favorite but it has the SPACE that I can't get in my HTC phones. I am surely satisfied for the discounted price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Geri Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Ive had this phone for almost a year now and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this phone for almost a year now and ive dropped it in the toilet a month after I got it and it still works perfectly (of course after sitting it in a bag of rice for a day)
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone out preforms all the others I have had and is a joy to use. Since it received the 4.3 Android upgrade I also purchased the Samsung Galaxy Gear and the devices are a wonderful combination. Would recommend this device to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann J. A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical, but shouldn't have been
customer_reviews.text: Based on the super deal I found on here, I was quite reluctant to buy this phone. Turns out, everything worked out great! Easy transition as far as upgrading my old phone to this new one. Collaborating with Boost mobile to make that transition was super easy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cea

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this is simply put a great phone, however its expensive so if your willing to spend the money then by all means go ahead, after i bought it i returned it though for a lg Venice because its much cheaper and does everything this s3 phone did
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: My son has this phone through a diff cell phone company and when I seen his and all the things it does I wanted to get one also , So I check out Boost Mobile's web site and it cost way to much , So I check out Amazon and red all the fed backs and finally found a awesome deal .. I'm still learning how to use it .. The only things I dislike is the battery life only last for 2 days and wishing it came with more info on how to use it ..but over all I' am happy with it so far
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Phone works fine. Came with a bad battery. Phone couldn't be turned on or stay on without being plugged into a charger until I replaced the battery.
customer_reviews.author: steve cushenbery

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I compared many phones before I made a decision to buy this one. I talked others who had owned this phone. I was nervous to spend so much money on a phone. When it finally arrived, it was really easy to transfer my information from my other phone. The battery lasts much longer than my other phone. I really love how easy it is to use. The screen is much more sensitive to touch and makes texting easier. It has surpassed my expectations. I just love love love this phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Val R

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, Takes great pics... like the other reviews my only complaint is the battery life, but other then that it's a great phone!
customer_reviews.author: christina hatkewitz

customer_reviews.title: Does whatever I need
customer_reviews.text: I've had it about three weeks now and have nothing to complain about it. Still discovering new features every day, but does so much more and much better quality than me HTC EVO. Highly recommend and it's cheaper than the Samsung 4, which just seems to be gimmicky (who needs a cell phone to change the channel on a TV when most cable/dish companies already have apps to do that).
customer_reviews.author: modryrox

customer_reviews.title: Great phone with great features
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It really works great. This phone has excellent features. I purchased 2 phones one for my daughter and the other one for myself. My favorite feature is the S beam, where we can touch our phones and share apps, pictures and music. Great phone
customer_reviews.author: chelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this Phone. It is not too small nor too big.
customer_reviews.author: sartessa

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but can be very sensitive to touch. This can cause problems such as disconnection, putting phone on mute or conference call. Other than that I think it is a good choice for a android phone that has all the features one would need.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had my phone for approx. a year and the only problem I had with it is when Samsung/Boost did an automatic update my phone went a little screwy. A few apps changed on me and a few left altogether, I lost internet service and my phone was deactivated. I ended up calling Customer Service twice before it was realized that I needed to key in a certain code to get the phone to function properly again. The only issue I have is battery life. Its not that great but I learned that if you turn off unnecessary apps and features the battery lasts a little longer. Other than that I love my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Carol

customer_reviews.title: good untill.....
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked perfectly untll out of no where it just started not to hold any charge, so i replaced the battery with a brand new one that i purchased from the phone store but still having problems the phone takes forever to charge i have no clue what could be wrong the phone must be defected
customer_reviews.author: jani

customer_reviews.title: It's a Samsung and I got the Quality I expected from them!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, it is the best smart phone that I have ever had! Samsung has done it again and paired up with Android OS you cannot go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Sue A

customer_reviews.title: ... charger doesnt work well at all it takes a good while before it starts to charge n it also ...
customer_reviews.text: The charger doesnt work well at all it takes a good while before it starts to charge n it also take very long time to charge our phones. But far as the phone its great but I'm not to sure is it the phone thats having difficulty charging or is it the charger but i honestly believe its the charger cuz when i use my computer/TV USB or cable box USB it charge my phone right away.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is horrible. I don't know if its the Boost Mobile ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is constantly updating at inconvenient times. Battery life is horrible. I don't know if its the Boost Mobile Network or the phone!! This is not an actual 4G PHONE! This phone is even slower than my Galaxy S II. I'm not even such a "tech head", but I would at least like to keep up to speed with staying connected. All my apps move slowly and come in and out of the network. UGH! Idk, Ijs.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone upgrade from an HTC Evo Design 4g. This phone display, and hardware make it better than my old phone and work iphone 4s. Great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Great and trusted service with Amazon and this vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Do i did not got what i expected, (missunderstood on my behalve), resolving the issue was way eassy. great service from amazon customer service, and vendor had a fast response to my return item request. well the product is good. is perfect, but i was requiring one that i could use with a sim card. (did not pay attention to description and title) even do i did not keep the product i'm a happy custome and i do recomemded product, (if sim card is not required) and the vendor's customer care.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Bolivar

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: Phone flashed pink and black and then wouldn't let me answer the phone. It finally cleared, but now I can't even charge the dang thing! Do NOT buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever I love it one of my favorite ...
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever I love it one of my favorite parts is the calendar bc I can read what's on my schedule without clicking on it.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone!!! I had heard about it from other people, and read just about all of the reviews on it..it is perfect, and surpasses all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ms_TnD

customer_reviews.title: still too new
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working like it should, but all things are great when they're new. Let me edit my rating after the phone is 9 months old, or so.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Woods

customer_reviews.title: used this phone for exactly 51 days, just 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: used this phone for exactly 51 days, just 20 days over the return time and the screen will not turn on. It is broken and I cannot return it. my last galaxy was dropped over and over and it lasted years and still works as a computer device. this seller may not be selling new items
customer_reviews.author: DRosa

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Can't receive any incoming calls or use Internet while on call. My last one worked better. Very VERY disappointed, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: NVaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, well priced
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, extremely pleased with its performance all around. I just bought another one for my brother and he loves it as well. Apple who??!??!?
customer_reviews.author: Ivan J.

customer_reviews.title: SquareTrade 1-Year Accident Protection Plan for Prepaid Cell Phone...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quick delivery and great product to have. I am very pleased with this product. The quality is great and the price was right. Easy to clean up after use.
customer_reviews.author: louis rose

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone! I was skeptical at first because of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone! I was skeptical at first because of the negative reviews, but they must be bogus! The phone is absolutely beautiful, and not much different than the S5. It is very slippery though, I bought a few wallet cases to keep it protected. I have been with Virgin Mobile for 6 years, and decided to switch to Boost, best decision ever made. Great phone and service!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Nunnery

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S III
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Samsung Galaxy. I know there is so much more to learn with the phone but unfortunelately it doesn't come with a manual about all the great apps it has.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea1

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but it was locked to sprint and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone but it was locked to sprint and I had to go to Best Buy to switch it to boost mobile. There is no sprint or boost mobile nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new phone. Great seller and exactly what I had ordered. I wished I had known not to add everything on to my new phone before I had activated it though. Otherwise am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie B

customer_reviews.title: Great service, though we had to have a working ...
customer_reviews.text: Great service, though we had to have a working phone stmt to us after the first was noon functional upon arrival. The second one came promptly and was as described and working.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone bought 1 for my wife one for me. Might upgrade to s5 later but love this s3 phone wife loves it too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like my phone but for the price i could of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like my phone but for the price i could of stayed with my prevail 2 cause it's basically the same phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Talahnie jones

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE.
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A GIFT, ,I CAN'T REALLY RATE IT MYSELF, BUT THEY LIKE THE PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great and new there was an issue with delivery. we paid for next day and due to weather it was delayed (UPS) does not deliver on weekends yet another reason i do not use them. i expected a denial for shipping refund because it was due to weather issues beyond their control and i would have understood that, however when i mentioned this to Amazon they refunded the next day delivery fee with in 2 hours with only one e-mail. Kuddos to Amazon and shop cell for a great price and customer satifaction. they delivered both with style
customer_reviews.author: Garrett P. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S111 Triband
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad phone really it's just that the battery runs down quickly even when I'm not using it
customer_reviews.author: Kiaame

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about the capabilities of this phone/computer. Light years ahead of anything I've ever used before.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: This phone works great and I've had it over a year now
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated that this phone was brand new just as I ordered. I was worried that is was not going to be truly, and absolutely, new but it was. This phone works great and I've had it over a year now. Should not be dissatisfied with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone. It by far blows away any phone that I have owned to date. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a great android phone,
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: LIfeless
customer_reviews.text: After paying over $200 dollars for this phone, after using it for a month or less than 30 days it stop charging on me. I have tried to buy different cords hoping that this will help, but it still will not turn on. It will not even turn on long enough for me to get the information off that I need. I warn anyone against purchasing this phone....:(
customer_reviews.author: Worthyn3996

customer_reviews.title: make Boost more enjoyable.....get one :-)
customer_reviews.text: ........what more could I say. BEST Android phone for Boost Mobile......hands down.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: No issues after purchase i think i need a battery now

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, works great, love all the features, the only problem, the charger did not work had to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brand new in the original box with all accessories. ...
customer_reviews.text: Brand new in the original box with all accessories. Worth the money. Luv boost!!! Luv it....(still miss my BlackBerry though)
customer_reviews.author: pinkpumkin

customer_reviews.title: better than the iphone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my phone! It does everything I want it to do and more! I would recommend this phone over the Iphone any day.
customer_reviews.author: Kollett

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! First time using Amazon and I ordered this phone. I was a little skeptical but my sister, who orders from AZ quite frequently, assured me it would be fine. And she was right!! 😃.. Not only did my phone come exactly when projected, it was wrapped great and I got emails and texts throughout the entire process. 👌👌. I would surely recommend Amazon. Oh and I love this phone!!
customer_reviews.author: Bre Washington

customer_reviews.title: It was not a real Galaxy, the letters started ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not a real Galaxy, the letters started to fall off, the back never fit on right and the screen went black after a few months. Do not buy from this person, had them send me an additional phone and had the same problem. Cheap cheap cheap

customer_reviews.author: Milton arturo ortiz bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone if not locked into Boost
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest phone I have ever owned. Unfortunately once purchased you are locked to Boost. Boost is the worst cell provider. Customer service in unbelievely poor. I have canceled Boost service and selling phone on Craig's list. Buy the Galaxy SIII, just avoid Boost. The GSIII has all the great features you expect from a high end smart phone. I have moved on to the unlocked Nexus 5. Give me poor service and I'll move to different cell provider.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Stupid design
customer_reviews.text: You can't put it a pocket, it will turn itself on all the time, and run the battery down. The button positions are just awful, no thought went into how this phone might be carried or used. Normally I can get a phone case that goes around the buttons so that they are not pressed inside my pocket. This phone has a button on the front below the screen, and the slightest touch turns the phone on for a few seconds. In a pocket this happens so much the phone will get hot like a hand warmer, it's just stupid.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy G

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful phone. I got it at an unbelievable price. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: convenience
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a smartphone for a couple of years but I wasn't fond of paying a large amount of money for a phone. I got it for about $309 and for Boost, which is prepaid and no contract needed. I'm happy with the product since instead of using an itouch to hear music, a kindle to also hear music and use the web, a small brick phone for texts and calls, the galaxy is the whole package.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S III 16GB SPH-L710 Marble White - Boost Mobile
feature_bullets: The Samsung Galaxy S III is a very capable Android smartphone featuring 4G LTE speeds, and 1.5GHz dual-core S4 processor
Features a gorgeous Super AMOLED 4.8-inch display, and an 8-megapixel camera capable of recording HD video and still images simultaneously
The S3 is also equipped with NFC technology, 16 GB built-in memory, microSD slot for additional storage
Also equipped with multi-format music player, WiFi, and GPS
This device offers access to thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on the Google Play Store
